🌟 Strengths Inventory Worksheet

Name: _________________________ Date: _________________

Class: _________________________ Period: ________________

Whakataukī | Proverb

"Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, he toa takitini"

My strength is not that of a single warrior, but that of many.

🎯 Purpose

This inventory helps you identify your unique strengths for collaborative work. Remember: every strength is valuable, and great teams need diverse skills. Be honest about your abilities - this helps create balanced, effective groups!

Rating Scale:

  • 3 = Strong: This is definitely one of my strengths
  • 2 = Good: I'm comfortable with this and can contribute
  • 1 = Learning: I'm developing this skill and need support

🤝 Collaboration Readiness

What unique perspective or strength will you bring to your group?

What type of group role appeals to you most? (Choose one or describe your own)

  • □ Research Coordinator - organizing information gathering
  • □ Creative Director - leading visual and design elements
  • □ Communications Manager - facilitating discussions and presentations
  • □ Systems Analyst - connecting ideas and solving problems
  • □ Project Organizer - managing timelines and keeping group on track
  • □ Cultural Liaison - ensuring diverse perspectives are included
  • □ Other: _________________________________

What do you hope to learn from working with classmates who have different strengths?

How will you contribute to creating an inclusive, respectful group environment?

🌿 Reflection on Collective Strength

How does the whakataukī "Ehara taku toa i te toa takitahi, he toa takitini" connect to what you learned about yourself today?
